title: Trump Impeachment Debate - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/17/19
itunes:title: Trump Impeachment Debate - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/17/19
description:
George Noory and political commentators John Curtis and Howard Bloom present their opposing viewpoints on whether President Trump should be impeached for his dealings with Ukraine to get damaging political information and other crimes.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
